Unraveling Blow.name: Unraveling Blow
Unraveling Blow.flavor: You see the threads of fate tying your foe to existence, and you cut them.
Unraveling Blow.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target is bloodied when you make the attack or has the undead keyword, the attack deals 1[W] extra damage and you add one die to Sneak Attack damage dealt through this attack.

Death's Veil.name: Death's Veil
Death's Veil.flavor: With the Raven Queenâ€™s blessing and your nearness to death, you become spiritlike.
Death's Veil.effect: You become invisible and insubstantial until the end of your next turn.

Herald the End.name: Herald the End
Herald the End.flavor: Your merciless strike shakes your foe to the core of its being. It then sees an end to its existence.
Herald the End.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). If the target is bloodied or has the undead keyword, it is instead stunned (save ends).
Herald the End.onMiss: Half damage, and if the target is bloodied or has the undead keyword, it is dazed until the end of its next turn.
